Termitron/Nightlight::

"No our base is near" said the femme while Termitron took her in 
arms, They took off and Nightlight said "I'm Nightlight and he's 
Termitron" 

They Flew towards Chivtrons' base

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nicolas Marion" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Plainly grateful to be saved, Starstomp felt she owed her saviors.
> 
> Starstomp:
> Thanks! I... guess I'll be okay. Is your base far? By the way, my 
name is 
> Starstomp, but you must've heard it in my distress message!
> 
> 
> >From: airly2000@y...
> >Reply-To: nbwrpg@y...
> >To: nbwrpg@y...

> >Termitron/Nightlight::
> >
> >Termitron took in arms Starstomp, while Nighlight said "Be careful,
> >Termitron she's so hurted"
> >
> >"I'll be carefull, Your ladyship"
> >
> >Nighlithgt noticed that Starstomp had regained consciousness"Are 
you
> >ok?" she said to Starstomp "We're going to our base where we leave
> >you in a cr... all will be ok"
> >
> >--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nicolas Marion" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Starstomp, while in stasis lock, regained somehow enough energy 
to
> >get out
> > > of the lock. It might have been the fusion between the DNA and 
the
> > > asteroid...
> > >
> > > Starstomp:
> > > Wha... where... am I?
> > >
> > > She then realized someone had found her, two beings... and they
> >were
> > > transformers too!
> > >
> > > Starstomp:
> > > By Prime's spark! I never thought I'd find transformers here, 
and
> >even less
> > > to be saved by some!
> > >
> > > She coughed, still weak even though she quickly recuperated.
